Uses of Package
org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.util.conversion

Packages that use org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.util.conversion
Package
Description
org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.util.conversion
 
  • Classes in org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.util.conversion used by org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.util.conversion
    Class
    Description
    DataConverter
    Converter which translates values as string representatives to actual long values representing the number of bits, e.g.,
    for size: "10 Bytes" -> 80, "2kbit" -> 2000
    for bandwidth: "10 MBps km/h" -> 80000000, "5 kbps" -> 5000

    Note: using "b" or "B" is a difference, as former stands for bits and later for bytes.
    TimeConverter
    Adapter for JSON fields which translates values as string representatives to actual long or double values (nanoseconds), e.g., "10 ms" -> 10_000_000, "20 ns" -> 20, "0.5h" -> 1_800_000_000_000
    UnitConverter
    Converter which translates values as string representatives to actual double values, e.g.,
    for distances: "10 km" -> 10000, "10 cm" -> 0.1, "0.5m" -> 0.5
    for speeds: "10 km/h" -> 2.77, "10 m/s" -> 10, "35 mph" -> 15.6464
